articles.author: Charles Q. Choi
articles.title: Human and ape ancestors arose in Europe, not in Africa, controversial study claims - Livescience.com
articles.description: A newly described fossil suggests that the ancestor of humans and apes arose in Europe, not in Africa.
articles.content:
The newly identified ape and human ancestor, Anadoluvius turkae. (Image credit: Sevim-Erol, A., Begun, D.R., Sözer, Ç.S. et al., University of Toronto, EurekAlert)

articles.author: Peter
articles.title: The Huawei Mate 60 Pro will not be available outside of China - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: This means it won't follow in the footsteps of the Mate 50 Pro from last year and the P60 Pro from this year, which are available in Europe.
articles.content: Yesterday, Huawei unveiled its latest flagship, the Mate 60 Pro. The phone is available for pre-order in China through Vmall at CNY 7,000 for the 12/512GB model. For those wondering whether the phone… [+601 chars]
